Angelica catalogue 1962

Download Here

About

Large catalogue (60 pages) of uniforms for waiters and waitresses, domestic servants, healthcare workers, barbers, factory workers, office workers, theater attendants, chefs, and more (all genders). 'Washable Service Uniforms' has a few B&W photographs, but mostly colored illustrations, approximately 10 by 12 inches. Price list in the middle of the catalogue. Manufacturer based in St. Louis, Missouri.

Title
Angelica catalogue 1962
Creator
Angelica
Contributor
Heather Akou
Creation Date
1962
Tags
